a barrel-shaped animal, with a pulsating organ at its end, fringed by spinning appendage.  Its jaws closing upon a drifting speck of algae, swallowing it whole.
a colony of barrel-shaped animals attached to some debris, from time to time one of them contracts and expands its body towards a passing cloud of small colorful shapes.
a golden spindle with a hard, transparent shell, floating silently.
a golden sphere with a hard, transparent shell, floating silently.
a golden cube with a hard, transparent shell, floating silently.
a thin white worm, aggressively wiggling in the center of your field of view.
a thin white worm with a pulsating red growth near one of its ends, laying motionless.
a big green blob floating away, it's full of round shapes of different sizes.
some kind of green structure made of multiple compartments sticking together, each of them full of round shapes of different sizes.
a small orange orb with four pairs of legs, clumsily traversing the small pieces of soil.
an eight-legged animal with an orange hue, its body pulsing with each awkward step.
a dark blur among the detritus, which upon stopping turns out to be a small oval crustacean with appendages at its rear

a dark blur among the detritus, which at one point begins to shake in place before splitting into two halves of a small oval crustacean.  You can see tiny tendrils beginning to extend from the split halves.
a chunky translucent blob, with various lengths of limbs protruding outwards.
some kind of soft blob, its jelly-like form shifting with each stretch, it seems to be hunting smaller organisms.
a handful of small, translucent forms with six legs each, waddling through the water.
a handful of small, translucent forms with six legs each, waddling through the water.  One of them appears to have several glowing dots inside.
a big, straight, green shape, so long it seems to go on forever, there's some kind of repeating zigzag structure inside.
big, impossibly long green shapes bunched together, they seem to be gliding along each other.
a huge structure made out of small transparent strands.
a huge structure made out of small transparent strands, looking closer, it appears to be full of tiny, round, colorful shapes.
